article_title: Hamas-run health ministry says Gaza death toll nearing 16,000.
sentence: The  health  ministry  in  Gaza,  which  is  run  by  Hamas,  has  announced  that  15,899  people  have  died  there  since  Israel  began  its  military  campaign  in  retaliation  for  the  7  October  attacks.
